meanings.definition: Lines on a weather map connecting points of equal atmospheric pressure.
meanings.sent1: Meteorologists use isobars to show areas with the same air pressure.
meanings.sent2: The isobars on the map help us understand where the pressure is high or low.
meanings.sent3: The isobars decided to throw a party for all the points with equal pressure.
meanings.sent4: The isobars acted like a web connecting different pressure points across the map.
meanings.sent5: The isobars painted a clear picture of the pressure distribution across the region.
